title: simplisisimus magazine
content:
Hi!!

I´m a graphic designer and i´m looking for information about a german magazine called simplisismus, this magazine was about art and was released at the begining of IXX century, any kind of information will be great for my research!!!  
Thank you

 [‹ looking for low, wide serif type](http://web.archive.org/web/20071113055931/http:/www.typophile.com/node/35678 "Go to previous forum topic") [Most Readable Serif Font on Earth ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071113055931/http:/www.typophile.com/node/35551 "Go to next forum topic")
author: akina

comments.content:
here you have the [website](http://web.archive.org/web/20071113055931/http:/www.simplicissimus.info/), here you have the [wiki](http://web.archive.org/web/20071113055931/http:/en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Simplicissimus) and here you can buy some issues on [eBay](http://web.archive.org/web/20071113055931/http:/cgi.ebay.co.uk/SIMPLICISSIMUS-MAGAZINE-JULY-1956_W0QQitemZ330126295934QQcmdZViewItem).

have fun!

You can read about it in [Merz to Emigre and Beyond: Avant-Garde Magazine Design of the Twentieth Century](http://web.archive.org/web/20071113055931/http:/www.amazon.com/Merz-Emigre-Beyond-Avant-Garde-Twentieth/dp/0714839272/) by Steven Heller
